pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃharanti;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.3: imassa sutvā amussa akkhāyanti, imassa bhedāya; amussa sutvā imassa akkhāyanti, amussa bhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.4: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.7: “kathañhi nāma chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃharissanti, imassa sutvā amussa akkhāyissanti, imassa bhedāya;
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.8: amussa sutvā imassa akkhāyissanti, amussa bhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.9: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.10: Atha kho te bhikkhū chabbaggiye bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṃ ārocesuṃ … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.11: “saccaṃ kira tumhe, bhikkhave, bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃharatha, imassa sutvā amussa akkhāyatha, imassa bhedāya, amussa sutvā imassa akkhāyatha, amussa bhedāya?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.12: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.15: kathañhi nāma tumhe, moghapurisā, bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃharissatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.16: Imassa sutvā amussa akkhāyissatha, imassa bhedāya. Amussa sutvā imassa akkhāyissatha, amussa bhedāya.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.17: Tena anuppannāni ceva bhaṇḍanāni uppajjanti, uppannāni ca bhaṇḍanāni bhiyyobhāvāya vepullāya saṃvattanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.1.5: jātitopi, nāmatopi, gottatopi, kammatopi, sippatopi, ābādhatopi, liṅgatopi, kilesatopi, āpattitopi, akkosatopi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.1.8: hīnā ca jāti ukkaṭṭhā ca jāti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.1.18: hīno ca akkoso ukkaṭṭho ca akkoso.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.1.20: akkoso—“oṭṭhosi, meṇḍosi, goṇosi, gadrabhosi, tiracchānagatosi, nerayikosi; natthi tuyhaṃ sugati; duggatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā”ti, yakārena vā bhakārena vā kāṭakoṭacikāya vā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.1.23: akkoso—“paṇḍitosi, byattosi, medhāvīsi, bahussutosi, dhammakathikosi; natthi tuyhaṃ duggati; sugatiyeva tuyhaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.1: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.2: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘caṇḍālo veno nesādo rathakāro pukkuso’ti bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.4: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.7: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.8: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘avakaṇṇako javakaṇṇako dhaniṭṭhako saviṭṭhako kulavaḍḍhako’ti bhaṇatī”ti.

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.25: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.26: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘naḷakāro kumbhakāro pesakāro cammakāro nahāpito’ti bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.28: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.31: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.32: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘kuṭṭhiko gaṇḍiko kilāsiko sosiko apamāriko’ti bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.34: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.49: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.50: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘pārājikaṃ ajjhāpanno, saṃghādisesaṃ ajjhāpanno, thullaccayaṃ ajjhāpanno, pācittiyaṃ ajjhāpanno, pāṭidesanīyaṃ ajjhāpanno, dukkaṭaṃ ajjhāpanno, dubbhāsitaṃ ajjhāpanno’ti bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.52: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.55: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.56: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘oṭṭho meṇḍo goṇo gadrabho tiracchānagato nerayiko, natthi tassa sugati, duggatiyeva tassa pāṭikaṅkhā’ti bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.58: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.59: “itthannāmo taṃ ‘paṇḍito byatto medhāvī bahussuto dhammakathiko, natthi tassa duggati, sugatiyeva tassa pāṭikaṅkhā’ti bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.61: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.62: “itthannāmo ‘santi idhekacce caṇḍālā venā nesādā rathakārā, pukkusā’ti bhaṇati, na so aññaṃ bhaṇati, taññeva bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.64: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.65: “itthannāmo ‘santi idhekacce khattiyā brāhmaṇā’ti bhaṇati, na so aññaṃ bhaṇati, taññeva bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.67: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.68: “itthannāmo ‘santi idhekacce paṇḍitā byattā medhāvī bahussutā dhammakathikā, natthi tesaṃ duggati, sugatiyeva tesaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā’ti bhaṇati, na so aññaṃ bhaṇati, taññeva bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.70: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.71: “itthannāmo ‘ye nūna caṇḍālā venā nesādā rathakārā pukkusā’ti bhaṇati, na so aññaṃ bhaṇati, taññeva bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.73: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.74: “itthannāmo ‘ye nūna paṇḍitā byattā medhāvī bahussutā dhammakathikā’ti bhaṇati, na so aññaṃ bhaṇati, taññeva bhaṇatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.76: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—

pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.79: Upasampanno upasampannassa sutvā upasampannassa pesuññaṃ upasaṃharati—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc3:2.2.80: “itthannāmo ‘na mayaṃ paṇḍitā byattā medhāvī bahussutā dhammakathikā, natthamhākaṃ duggati, sugatiyeva amhākaṃ pāṭikaṅkhā’ti bhaṇati, na so aññaṃ bhaṇati, taññeva bhaṇatī”ti.
